alert.note: Alert for Lyon (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 4:26AM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Lyon County through 500 AM CDT... At 425 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Bushong to 5 miles north of Emporia. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Reading, Allen, Admire and Bushong. This includes Kansas Turnpike between mile markers 134 and 153. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
